text: FC is an acronym. FC stands for "Football Club". In the J-League, the team is one of seven with FC in the club name. is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-6. in Matsuyama, which is in Ehime Prefecture.Soccerway.com, "Ehime FC"; retrieved 2012-3-6. ==History== The club was founded in 1970. * 1970-1994: Matsuyama SC * 1995-present: Ehime FC ==League title== * Japan Football League: 1 ** 2005 ==League position== *2001: Football League - 12th *2002: Football League - 6th *2003: Football League - 3rd *2004: Football League - 5th *2005: Football League - 1st *2006: J2 League - 9th *2007: J2 League - 10th *2008: J2 League - 14th *2009: J2 League - 15th *2010: J2 League - 11th *2011: J2 League - 15th *2012: J2 League - 16th *2013: J2 League - 17th *2014: J2 League - 19th *2015: J2 League - 5th *2016: J2 League - 10th *2017: J2 League - 15th *2018: J2 League - 18th *2019: J2 League - 19th *2020: J2 League - 21st ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Ehime FC players == References == ==Other websites== * * Ehime FC website * J.League Club Guide Category:Football clubs in Ehime Prefecture
title: Ehime FC
